column3: This is a workaround for the issue described in IDEA-143854.
It allows having larger font size in IDEA ("Appearance > Override default fonts") while keeping the icons at their original size (sharp!).

It does so by short-circuiting calls to JBUI.setScaleFactor() in case -Dhidpi=false has been defined.
This brings setScaleFactor() in sync with calculateScaleFactor() behavior.
(And also prevents the splash-screen from lubberly changing the scale midway due to the call from LafManagerImpl.patchLafFonts())
I've been using IDEA with this patch since the "HiDPI build". And haven't noticed any undesired effects.
